import React from 'react' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' class FavoriteCards extends React.Component { render () { console.log('favorites data',this.props.school) return (
School Name:{this.props.favorite.school_name} Description: {this.props.favoritedescription} Rating: {this.props.rating}
) } } export default FavoriteCards
